claim_text: According to the International Monetary Fund (IMF), Italy's nominal Gross Domestic Product (GDP) was estimated to be approximately $2.19 trillion for the year 2023.
In terms of GDP per capita (nominal), the figure for Italy was estimated at around $37,150 for 2023.
When considering GDP at Purchasing Power Parity (PPP), Italy's GDP was estimated at approximately $3.2 trillion for 2023.
This nominal GDP figure places Italy as the 8th largest economy in the world.
